page.title: 03Living in Five Oak Green
page.content: Living in Five Oak Green has advantages and disadvantages.Shopping facilities are limited and buses infrequent so transport is difficult for the elderly or families without cars. There is a Post Office,a hairdressers,a garage and a D.I.Y. shop.Service in the two general stores is personal and friendly. Milk and bread are delivered daily and kind neighbours transport elderly friends to shops and the Health Centre in Paddock Wood. Entertainment for the elderly is provided by Capel Country Friends. There is a large playing field and modern community centre.We have Brownies,Cubs,Scouts,a Youth Club and a playgroup for children. Badminton,The Sports and Social Club, Women's Institute and Gardener's Society are favourite adult groups. Two small churches worship in covenant.
